name: Glorify
description: Glorify is a design tool that enables entrepreneurs and marketers to create marketing visuals, offering features like AI-powered tools, template libraries, and collaboration capabilities.
longDescription: Glorify is a design platform designed for over 300,000 entrepreneurs and marketers, focusing on creating marketing visuals to convert browsers into buyers. It provides a limitless canvas for designing multiple graphics and videos, integrating AI-powered tools to enhance speed and ease of use. The tool offers access to a vast library of free, high-quality assets and supports collaboration through features like team workspaces and file sharing. Its mission is to empower e-commerce and CPG business owners with user-friendly, professional design solutions, catering to both beginners and experienced designers with pro workflows. Glorify differentiates itself by tailoring its features for e-commerce needs, making professional design accessible without requiring advanced skills.
features: Design multiple graphics and videos on a limitless canvas within one platform to streamline creative workflows.
Access a range of easy-to-use editing capabilities, including background removal and image adjustments, for quick enhancements.
Utilize AI-powered tools such as AI image generator, AI product background, AI writer, and AI background remover to automate and accelerate design tasks.
Provide a vast library of high-quality stock photos, illustrations, mockups, and templates, all available for commercial use to inspire and support designs.
Enable teamwork with features for sharing, collaboration, and commenting directly on files to facilitate group projects.
Organize design files with folders, brand kits, and tags for easy access and management, improving efficiency.
Export designs in various formats, including print-ready PDFs, with options for batch exporting and controlled sharing to meet diverse needs.
Offer pro workflows like gradients, pen tool, blending, text on path, patterns, and upcoming masking features for advanced editing.
Include tools for adding realistic shadows, reflections, and annotations to product photos, enhancing visual appeal for marketing.

faqs.question: What is Glorify, and how does it work?
faqs.answer: Glorify is a design tool for creating marketing visuals, working by providing a limitless canvas and AI-powered features for easy customization and asset creation.

faqs.question: How is Glorify different from other design tools?
faqs.answer: Glorify is tailored for e-commerce, offering AI tools, free asset libraries, and collaboration features, distinguishing it from tools like Canva and Photoshop.

faqs.question: Do I have to be a designer to use Glorify?
faqs.answer: No, Glorify is user-friendly and designed for non-designers, with easy editing capabilities and templates for quick design creation.

faqs.question: How do the AI credits work?
faqs.answer: AI credits are used for AI-powered features like image generation and background removal, allocated based on the chosen subscription plan.

faqs.question: Do I have the right to use Glorify for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glorify's assets, including stock photos and mockups, are available for commercial use as part of the subscription.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with my team on Glorify?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glorify offers features for team collaboration, including inviting guests, adding comments, and sharing files with controlled access.

faqs.question: Are there templates available in Glorify?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glorify provides over 11,000 customizable templates, including thematic collections for various design needs.

faqs.question: Can I export designs for print?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glorify allows exporting in print-ready PDF formats and other formats suitable for both digital and print purposes.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glorify offers a 7-day free trial for all plans, allowing users to test core features before committing to a subscription.

faqs.question: What kind of support does Glorify provide?
faqs.answer: Glorify provides customer support through various channels, including help centers and priority support for higher-tier plans.
